content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Continuous learning is a key to professional success in the modern fast world in general and in EPAM in particular. That’s why our company has  a comprehensive infrastructure for your learning.\\r  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":11513,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c7f16a16-344e-4011-bd5a-cb4809d9ace4/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c7f16a16-344e-4011-bd5a-cb4809d9ace4/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c7f16a16-344e-4011-bd5a-cb4809d9ace4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":510,\"height\":68},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In EPAM you can boost your skills within four areas, offered by the Learning & Development (L&D) team:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":105575,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d8b95b91-eb90-43f9-a384-5c3350457c47/l&d.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d8b95b91-eb90-43f9-a384-5c3350457c47/l&d.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"l&d.PNG\",\"name\":\"l&d.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d8b95b91-eb90-43f9-a384-5c3350457c47\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":845,\"height\":467},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"L&D provides you with 20,000 of internally tailored courses that consider the specific company needs of EPAM employees. You could gain new skills, studying online with a group of colleagues, going through individual mentoring, or watching recorded courses at your own pace. Moreover, external learning solutions are available for you as a benefit of being an EPAMer: LinkedIn Learning courses are at your service by default; the subscription to the resources, like Cloud Guru and O’Reilly, can be requested separately.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A single entry point to the world of your continuous learning is the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LEARN\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" portal. Some of the courses there are even available for you before your first day at EPAM  through your social account. The L&D team of experts in learning can select the right courses for you and create an individual learning plan – just drop a line to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskLearn@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AskLearn@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", if this is  something in which you are interested.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We know that finding the time for learning is not always easy because of the volume of daily tasks. But even 30 minutes a day of learning can make a difference. Here are some ideas on when you might need to boost your learning efforts during your professional journey:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"when you join a new project and want to fill some gaps in your knowledge;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"when you get feedback from your manager or peers on what you can improve;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"when you feel that your English level is not good enough;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"when you aim  for a new professional role or level;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"when you are between projects and want to use your spare time wisely.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No matter what scenario is yours – the L&D team is always here to support your strive for excellence!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":9796,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/48fdb05a-b680-49f9-8500-d0fb6c2e0ad9/lu.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/48fdb05a-b680-49f9-8500-d0fb6c2e0ad9/lu.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"lu.JPG\",\"name\":\"lu.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"48fdb05a-b680-49f9-8500-d0fb6c2e0ad9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":239,\"height\":76},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Looking for a place where you can find unified information about your career at EPAM? Check LEVEL UP - your personal guide to navigate professional growth - from choosing the right career target to defining and developing required skills.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to the LEVEL UP portal (wich will be available after your start date), explore recommended career options, build a path to the desired target, choose it, and start working on the skills you need to achieve your goal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5949,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e/feedback.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e/feedback.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"feedback.PNG\",\"name\":\"feedback.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":546,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is an important part of the Performance Review program at EPAM. It is a regular and ongoing process for obtaining feedback on the quality of your work from your colleagues and customers. Reviews are collected and processed by Resource Managers, after which employees are provided with consolidated feedback.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback results are taken into account when developing your career development plan.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=noPnEZJX\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6771,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5/asmt.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5/asmt.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"asmt.PNG\",\"name\":\"asmt.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":562,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Promotion is an important event in the life of every employee. To help you achieve a promotion, the company developed the Assessment process for specific job functions and levels.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAssessment makes promotions objective, transparent, and grounded. The international committee of Experts plays a key role in this process by sharing its opinion on Candidates’ readiness for promotion and giving feedback for further growth.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":5305839,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3cce299-cd76-4abc-8a5e-820886136808/Assessment_booklet.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3cce299-cd76-4abc-8a5e-820886136808/Assessment_booklet.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Assessment_booklet.pdf\",\"name\":\"Assessment_booklet.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"b3cce299-cd76-4abc-8a5e-820886136808\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
